name: Corridors of Doom2: The Return of Faceman
name_original: Corridors of Doom2: The Return of Faceman
description:
The long awaited sequel of the 2021 gamejolt classic "Corridors of Doom", now even more dark and sinister.

You are Pablo, just a normal guy coming home from work, only to have his life be shattered into pieces.

Will you be able to escape Faceman? Or will something completely unexpected happen?

It features:

- a deep and emotional story with romanceable characters

- an AI enemy that feels like it's alive

- extraordinary sound design

and much more
